398
March 13th 5
Lt John F. Lay
Colesburg Ky
Sir
Your letter of the 11th inst, to his Excellency Gov Bramlette has been referred to this office. It is not deemed advisable to raise any more state troops at present.

Very Respectfully
D, W, Lindsey
Adjt Genl Ky
